required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Cabozantinib Real-life Use for Advanced Renal Cell Carcinoma in France: a Retrospective Descriptive Non-interventional Study of 2 Cohorts.
clinical_study.official_title: Cabozantinib Real-life Use for Advanced Renal Cell Carcinoma in France: a Retrospective Descriptive Non-interventional Study of 2 Cohorts.

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of the study is to describe the real-life conditions of use and exposure of cabozantinib in France in two cohorts defined by their treatment initiation period.

primary_outcome.time_frame: during the whole study period for a maximum of 28 to 31 months
during the whole study period for a maximum of 28 to 31 months
during the whole study period for a maximum of 28 to 31 months
primary_outcome.description: average daily dose received by subject during the treatment exposure

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with ≥1 temporary interruptions
primary_outcome.time_frame: during the whole study period for a maximum of 28 to 31 months
during the whole study period for a maximum of 28 to 31 months

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with ≥1 dose modification(s)
primary_outcome.time_frame: during the whole study period for a maximum of 28 to 31 months

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with permanent discontinuations
primary_outcome.time_frame: during the whole study period for a maximum of 28 to 31 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall survival of subjects since cabozantinib initiation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: during the whole study period for a maximum of 28 to 31 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall survival of subjects since RCC diagnosis.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: during the whole study period for a maximum of 28 to 31 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall survival of subjects since metastatic diagnosis
secondary_outcome.time_frame: during the whole study period for a maximum of 28 to 31 months

arm_group.description: Subjects who received at least one dose of cabozantinib during the Authorization for Use (ATU) period (12/09/2016 to 09/12/2016) for the treatment of advanced Renal Cell Carcinoma (RCC).
Subjects who received at least one dose of cabozantinib during the first six months after the ATU period (10/12/2016 to 16/02/2018).

study_pop.textblock: Cohort 1: subjects who received at least one dose of cabozantinib during the ATU period (12/09/2016 to 09/12/2016) for the treatment of advanced RCC. Cohort 2: subjects who received at least one dose of cabozantinib during the first six months after the ATU period (10/12/2016 to 16/02/2018).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Any subjects from the participating sites (dead or alive) who have received at least one dose of cabozantinib within the ATU program or between 10/12/2016 and 16/02/2018 and for whom the medical file is available
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients alive at study initiation who have not received information notice
- who have opposed to data collection.
